issue.title: [R][CI] Use processx to set up minio and flight servers in tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11071](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11071). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Rather than rely on them being set up outside of the tests. processx is already a transitive test dependency (testthat uses it) so there's no reason for us not to.
